data.text:
üò∞I‚Äôm at a loss. I cannot decide which part of the city I should stay for 4 nights? I was leaning toward Karakoy because the ferry was nearby & I knew I was going to do a day trip to Asia. I was trying to avoid the touristy area because I heard it‚Äôs just overpriced & you pretty much see everything in a day or 2. (I‚Äôm sure some will want to debate this)

Taksim from what I‚Äôve heard is quite busy. Better known for their nightlife.

The reason I‚Äôm reaching for suggestions is because I noticed the hotel ratings weren‚Äôt so kind to Karakoy. In Sultanahmet & Faith, I see wonderful rave reviews for lodging. I‚Äôm tempted just to book there because some of the reviews just woo you. üòÇMainly commenting on staff & hospitality.

So just need to hear from real RS reviewers.

Thanks. Any comments are greatly appreciated
